q1.question: I cannot add photos
q1.answer:
Supported image formats are JPEG, PNG, and WEBP.

If your iPhone photos are in HEIC format, they cannot be uploaded. Change your iPhone settings: Settings ‚Üí Camera ‚Üí Formats ‚Üí Most Compatible to save as JPEG.

There is no file size limit, but very large images (over 10MB) may take time to process.

q2.question: Where are photos stored?
q2.answer:
Photos are stored in your browser's IndexedDB (local storage).

They are never sent to a server - everything stays on your device. Your privacy is completely protected.

Note: If you clear your browser data, stored photos will be deleted. We recommend backing up regularly.

q3.question: What is the backup feature?
q3.answer:
The backup feature downloads your saved photos as a JSON file.

„ÄêHow to Backup„Äë
1. Click the "Backup" button on the photo management screen
2. A JSON file will be downloaded
3. Save this file in a safe location

„ÄêHow to Restore„Äë
1. Click the "Restore" button on the photo management screen
2. Select your saved JSON file
3. Photos will be restored (duplicates are skipped)

With backups, you can use the same photos on different devices or browsers.

q4.question: My photos disappeared
q4.answer:
Reasons photos may disappear:

‚Ä¢ Browser cache/data was cleared
‚Ä¢ Using private/incognito mode
‚Ä¢ Opened on a different browser or device

„ÄêSolution„Äë
If you have a backup file, you can restore your photos using the "Restore" feature.

Without a backup, unfortunately photos cannot be recovered. We recommend backing up regularly in the future.

q5.question: What are folders?
q5.answer:
The folder feature lets you organize photos by category.

„ÄêCreating Folders„Äë
1. Click "New Folder" button on photo management screen
2. Enter a folder name (e.g., Portraits, Landscapes, Animals)

„ÄêOrganizing Photos„Äë
‚Ä¢ When uploading: Select a folder before adding photos
‚Ä¢ Existing photos: Use the 3-dot menu (‚ãÆ) ‚Üí "Move to Folder"

„ÄêPractice by Folder„Äë
Select a folder on the practice start screen to practice with only photos in that folder.

„ÄêDeleting Folders„Äë
Deleting a folder doesn't delete photos - they move to "All Photos".

q6.question: Can I use this on iPad/tablet?
q6.answer:
Yes, you can use this on iPad/tablet.

„ÄêHow to Use„Äë
1. Open Safari or Chrome on your iPad
2. Access this app's URL
3. Draw with your finger or Apple Pencil

„ÄêTouch Controls„Äë
‚Ä¢ Tap the canvas directly to draw
‚Ä¢ Pinch to zoom (browser feature)
‚Ä¢ Scroll prevention keeps the page from moving while drawing

q7.question: Do you collect personal information?
q7.answer:
No, we do not collect any personal information.

„ÄêData Storage Location„Äë
‚Ä¢ All data is stored in your browser (IndexedDB)
‚Ä¢ Nothing is sent to our servers
‚Ä¢ Works completely offline

„ÄêData Stored„Äë
‚Ä¢ Uploaded photos
‚Ä¢ Drawing data
‚Ä¢ Folder settings
‚Ä¢ Language settings

All of this data is stored only on your device and is never transmitted externally.

q8.question: About Cookies and Advertising
q8.answer:
This app uses Google AdSense to display advertisements.

„ÄêCookie Usage„Äë
Google AdSense uses cookies for:
‚Ä¢ Displaying personalized ads
‚Ä¢ Measuring ad effectiveness
‚Ä¢ Remembering user ad preferences

„ÄêPrivacy Settings„Äë
You can disable personalized ads from Google's ad settings page:
https://www.google.com/settings/ads

„ÄêThird-Party Sharing„Äë
‚Ä¢ This app does not share data with third parties
‚Ä¢ For data collected by Google AdSense, please refer to Google's Privacy Policy

q9.question: Terms of Use & Operator Information
q9.answer:
„ÄêTerms of Use„Äë
This app is provided "as is" without any warranties.

‚Ä¢ We are not responsible for data loss or deletion
‚Ä¢ Regular backups are recommended
‚Ä¢ App specifications may change without notice

„ÄêOperator Information„Äë
Operator: Annyui

„ÄêDisclaimer„Äë
‚Ä¢ The operator assumes no liability for damages resulting from use of this app
‚Ä¢ Photos may be lost if browser data is deleted
‚Ä¢ Please use the backup feature
